name: A Small Hunt - Duck Attack
description:
Spin around. Shoot the ducks. Get the Highscore.

Will you look insane while playing this game? Probably a bit. Especially in public :)


••• Features •••

• Gyroscope augmented reality controls!
• Highscores & Achievements!
• Pixel block style 3D Graphics!
• Extreme Physical Gameplay!
• Old-School Arcade Action!
• No IAP!
• Crazy ducks!
• Bonus levels!

••• Disclaimer: No animals were seriously harmed during the making of this game. •••
